## Problem 1
### Task a

```{r}
x <- read.csv("./x.csv")
variances <- sapply(x, var)
variances <- variances[order(variances, decreasing = TRUE)]
first <- x[names(variances[1])]
second <- x[names(variances[2])]
to_plot <- data.frame(first, second)
plot(to_plot)
```
